ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3 pound) boneless pork loin roast, or more to taste
1 tablespoon barbeque spice rub, or to taste
1 (18 ounce) bottle barbecue sauce, or to taste

cookingTips: Rub pork generously with spice blend and let rest before cooking
Braise low and slow at 300Â°F for about 3-4 hours until very tender
Shred with two forks while warm and mix with barbecue sauce
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is an easy Dutch oven pulled pork with minimal ingredients. Emphasize the hands-off braising and the magic of low-temperature cooking.
